<img src="http://srvis.com/assets/images/logo_on_white.png" />
  
 Hello LET,
 
 It has been a while since we've advertised any virtual machine offerings, well we are back with virtual machines in our Troy, MI location. With great peering to Australia, Europe, and US. 

We have a great new plan with 4GB of RAM available for you!
 
 If you have any questions do not hesitate to ask. We may run out of stock however we plan on increasing stock throughout the week for these offers. 
 
 Thanks again!
  
  
  **4096 OpenVZ Plan in Troy, Michigan**  
  -4096MB Ram  
  -2048MB vSwap  
  -1000GB Bandwidth  
  -100GB Storage  
  -2 vCPU  
  -1 IPv4 Address  
  -100Mbit/s Port  
  -SAS-70 Audited Datacenter  
  -Branded Hardware  
  -Raid-10  
  -99.9% Uptime SLA  
  -7-Day Money Back  
  -SolusVM Control Panel  
  
  **For $7.00/month.**  
   https://srvis.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=6  
  
  **Contact Us:**  
  Email: sales@srvis.com  
  Ticket: http://srvis.com/portal/submitticket.php  
  
  We accept PayPal or Credit Cards (Processed Separately from PayPal)
